# Flip

## Flip `flip`

Flips the image. Accepts `v`, `h` and `both`.

~~~ html
<img src="kayaks.jpg?h=500&flip=v">
~~~

[![Â© Photo Joel Reynolds](https://glide.herokuapp.com/1.0/kayaks.jpg?h=500&flip=v)](https://glide.herokuapp.com/1.0/kayaks.jpg?h=500&flip=v)
